analysis.key_quote: This proposed rule will not improve accountability but will revert the federal civil service to the spoils system of Andrew Jackson. A system that led to appointments on loyalty rather than qualifications resulting in an inefficient federal government.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about the erosion of merit-based systems, due process, and the potential for increased politicization of the civil service. The author emphasizes the importance of a nonpartisan workforce and the risks to institutional knowledge.
